name: One Way Out (itaypoo)
description:
One Way Out -

Art and code by Itaypoo. Controller recommended!

You're on your way to hell, when a shady person comes up to you and offers a weird mushroom. "This is the only way out of here, boy!" 

You take the mushroom and find yourself in a weird place, and see some creatures that are trying to kill you. You must fight back and defeat the Card Master to go back home. 

Slay 15 monsters to get a card that will give you a good/bad bonus. 

Survive 20 waves to reach the Card Master.

Controlls - 

Move - Left stick or Left Mouse Button

Shoot - A or Right Mouse Button
